::Dark One/Nemesis Enforcer/Pyro/Punch::

Dark One laughs at Iron Raptor, turning to Nemesis. "Well, how do they work?"

Nemesis Enforcer looks from Tavatron to Iron Raptor. Neither of them seemed 
eager to find out.

"Its very simple, really," he says anyways, "This little bug attatches to 
your neck, sliding its mouthpiece through your skin. It taps into your 
nervious system, taking over your pain sensory circuits. Then it proceeds to 
manipulate those circuits, activating them on full power. You'll feel pain 
like you never felt before. Worse than me slamming this metal rod through 
your stomach," Nemesis points to a cruel-looking metal rod in the corner. He 
looks down at the bugs.

"Oh yes, and they disable your safeguard of falling unconscious. Or delay it 
severely. Only one bug is needed for the procedure, and since there are 
two...." he looks at Iron Raptor, evil in his eyes, "You'll get to enjoy this 
experience too."

Dark One shakes his head, "I think its better if we let her watch. She seemed 
unwilling to do so before."

Nemesis Enforcer looks at Dark One, "Believe me, she'd rather watch than go 
through this."

He tosses one of the bugs to Dark One. "Get it prepared. It needs to be 
charged."

Dark One nods, walking over to a console.
